parameters.name: shares
parameters.description: Array of arrays, one per account user for whom sharing is enabled for this layout.  Each string contains two field separated by comma.  The first field is a user aid and the second field are permissions for the user. Two special user ID exist: ‘account’ specifies that the layout is shared with all users of the account. Second field contains permissions for users in the account. Example: [‘cafedead’,’RWDS’] = user can view, change, delete or share this layout. [‘cafe0001’,’RW’] = user can view this layout and change this layout. [‘account’, ‘R’] = All users of the account can view this layout. Permissions for the user issuing the /layout GET are not included in this array.

configuration.description: JSON object that defines the layout configuration

permissions.description: String of zero or more characters.  Each character defines a permission. Permissions include: 'R' - user can view this layout. 'W' - user can modify this layout. 'D' - user can delete this layout. 'S' - user can share this layout

The first field is a user aid and the second field are permissions for the user. Two special user ID exist: ‘account’ specifies that the layout is shared with all users of the account. Second field contains permissions for users in the account. Example: [‘cafedead’,’RWDS’] = user can view, change, delete or share this layout. [‘cafe0001’,’RW’] = user can view this layout and change this layout. [‘account’, ‘R’] = All users of the account can view this layout. current_recording_key.description: String key representing a recording currently being made with the cameras in the layout, which was initiated using the action/recordnow service.

type.description: ‘preview’ - shows live preview images form cameras. ‘carousel’- rotates between preview images, ids of cameras needs to be include in the cameras array along with an integer in the delay array.  The delay is an integer value of milliseconds as too how long the Camera will be displayed before switching to the next Camera.  A “carousel” with only one camera is the same as preview. ‘click’ - respond to click for other cameras in layout. ‘motion’ - respond to motion for other cameras in layout. ‘map’ - a static map with camera icons located on it. ‘url’ - displays the contents of the url in the pane as a frame.

pane_id.description: ID given to pane when created from Layout Manager

size.description: Size to display image: 1 = small, 2 = medium, 3 = large

cameras.description: Array of camera ids. For ‘carousel’, cycle through the camera ids with the delay setting in the corresponding ‘delay’ property

delay.description: Array of integers indicating amount of delay before changing to next camera image.  Time is in milliseconds.  Only used for type ‘carousel’

camera_row_limit.description: Max number of cameras to show per row

types.description: Array of types defined for the layout. This attribute has not yet been implemented.

permissions.description: String of zero or more characters.  Each character defines a permission that the current user has for the layout. Permissions include: 'R' - user can view this layout. 'W' - user can modify this layout. 'D' - user can delete this layout. 'S' - user can share this layout
